properties.name: outbox.jdbc.table-prefix
properties.description: Prefix to apply to all outbox table names (e.g., 'my_' results in 'my_outbox_record')

properties.name: outbox.jdbc.schema-name
properties.description: Database schema name for outbox tables (e.g., 'myschema' results in 'myschema.outbox_record')

properties.name: outbox.jdbc.schema-initialization.enabled
properties.description: Whether schema initialization is enabled at startup
